abrogate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to officially end a legal agreement, practice etc
abrogate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Both governments voted to abrogate the treaty.
abrogate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to officially end a law, agreement, or practice
abrogate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: They accused the company of abrogating its contract.
